website_summaries.verdict: One of the best food and beverage thermoses on the market today, this Zojirushi insulated food jar holds oatmeal, soup, meats and other hot foods at temperature for hours, and is easy enough for a child to open at lunchtime.
pros: Wide lid makes opening much easier
Holds approximately two cups of food
Durable and stylish stainless steel construction
cons: Food residue can get trapped in gasket
No individual containers, one food item only

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It's so small. I'm never very good at looking at dimensions online and just figure out how big they actually are. I posted some pictures of the size so that other people with same problem as me can check it out. The pyrex glass jar shows how much water this cup holds. But other than that, this cup is so good! It kept my oatmeal so hot until lunch time that it burnt my mouth. However, I would recommend checking out this blue one by the same brand. This one is 29.95, the blue one is 33.40. And this one holds 1 1/2 cups of water, the blue holds 3 cups. It is on amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My 7th grader wanted to pack ramen for his school lunch, so we did a little experiment with the Zojirushi food jar. It works quite well!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Eureka! I have found you!
customer_reviews.text: By middle school, my kid was done with the rotation of the same two sandwiches. We tried funtainer for a while and it did NOT work at all. Maybe it was a defect. But this! This keeps that ravioli, spaghetti, soup and glorious leftovers earth's magma hot. The first day, my girl told me I could ease up, the food was actually too hot! Now, I just preheat with a little hot tap water and microwave like a normal person. No need to nuke to the blazing heat of 10,000 suns the way I used to with the funtainer. Great product. Great size. Clean the cap with a brush to get into the crevices. In short, it's kicka**!
customer_reviews.author: G. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: It looks really beautiful and cute
customer_reviews.text: It looks really beautiful and cute. However, after about one year, I started to see some yellowish-brown rust inside the jar, exactly around the bottom line. I never put anything corrosive in it, such as lemonade. I don't know how comes the rust and what to do about it. Later the rust became larger and longer, and I have to stop using it. Pity. I have a high expectation of Zojirushi's quality, and I bought several other Zojirushi products. Only this food jar turned out to be a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The Only Trusted Brand I'll Buy
customer_reviews.text: Grew up in a household that uses Zojirushi tumblers, food jars and stackable food containers. Not once has this brand failed in its intended purpose and functionality. I didn't have any issue (as indicated by some buyers) with the top lid cover always coming unscrewed or have difficulty removing it from its main lid-base for cleaning or releasing pressure. No paint peeling or chipping from its exterior wall. Cleaning is easy along with disassembling/reassembling all attachment pieces; only hand wash it with soft sponge and drying with paper towel to prevent water droplet stains/potential rusting. Freshly made soup filled at 07:20 AM: 162.7 °F (No preheating interior w/hot water needed) By 02:50 PM (7.5 hrs later): 135.1°F
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is perfect, don't bother with other brands!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thermos I have used. I also have the larger 17-oz size, but I had to order that from another vendor. I use boiling water in the morning to heat it up for 15-min or so, then put my hot soup or food into the container. It stays very warm or hot until lunchtime. There is a twist-off, removable top portion that opens so that you can let steam out before opening the actual lid. Cleans up very easily and ready for the next day! I find Zojirushi products to be superior to most everything else I have tried, so don't waste your money on the other brands--try this instead!
customer_reviews.author: SocalDancer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT for older people!
customer_reviews.text: I never even got a chance to use it - just taking it apart to clean it was nearly impossible and then just TRY to get it put back together correctly! I couldn't get my fingers to pull the valve packing thing out at all, I tried everything. It said to be careful not to scratch with your fingernails but the only way I could get the gasket back on was using my fingernails. The whole thing is just way too complicated for me, I'm returning it. For arthritic older hands, it just isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Cancer Warning!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how the seller expects people buy this bottle when it has such a big cancer warning on the package!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird hole at the bottom let the water get inside
customer_reviews.text: The label from the bottom peeled off in a month, and exposed a tiny hole at the bottom of the container. I did not pay much attention to it, until I notice some strange noise. It turned out that this little hole lets water inside the container's walls and stays there. It's impossible to dry it...I think it's a potential health hazard - there will be mold inside the jar's walls later on...
customer_reviews.author: Simple User

customer_reviews.title: It’s fake!
customer_reviews.text: I buy from the seller named Japan_Dealz, which is totally disappointed. I got the same jar in 0.75 L from another seller which is good, but this time I got one in 0.5 L from Japan_Dealz, which I think it’s fake. When putting hot water inside, the jar becomes warm from outside, that means the temperature cannot be kept. Avoid to buy from Japan_Dealz.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: My current job doesn't have a microwave available so I was stuck eating cold lunches or having to buy food every day. I'm happy to be back to brown bagging with this thermos. You do have to heat the food up in a different container before sealing it in here, but it stays warm the whole day! So far I've eaten 6 hours after sealing and my lunch was still warm and delicious. The thermos is also easy to clean and I appreciate that every piece comes apart to make sure nothing gets stuck in the crevices. This means nothing gets stinky over time! It has a well thought out design and works wonderfully. I'll be buying more for backups!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good for up to 4-5 hours
customer_reviews.text: Great for limited periods of time but mine did not last past the 4-5 hour mark, which is what I mostly needed it for. It also has many parts, which can be difficult to clean but also serves the purpose of sealing in the heat. Overall, it’s nice but not my favorite. EDIT: after 2 uses, it now squeaks every time I turn the cap on and off. A bit disappointed but I also ordered an open box item.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping food warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I had a medium sized (0.5L) version which I bought from a Korean market. When I used the smaller one to take soup after heating for a meal at work, even after 5 or more hours the soup was still very hot. It worked amazingly well. So after I was happy with the smaller size, I was thinking of getting the larger size which is why I bought this bigger size(0.75L) from here, but I’m really disappointed, after 3 and half hour, the soup just little warm, not hot at all. It’s still fine for normal use (at least the food not cold), but compared to my other one, this is really not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this and it has been a huge disappointment. It has leaked several times now. As i type this it has leaked yet Again onto my backpack. One time i put warm (not hot) chili in it in the morning; by lunch time i could not open the lid to save my life. As soon as i put it down on the kitchen counter at work, the lid exploded off the thermos launching beans all over the wall and counter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Anyone else see the cancer warning?
customer_reviews.text: We were excited for this product until we saw the cancer warning on the side. No thanks! Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bork

customer_reviews.title: Wide open, like a coffee mug, easy to wash the interior.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sleek a replacement for the apparently discontinued Nissan Food Jar of the same size, but it does share the essential features, including the wide, easy-to-fill-and-empty opening and stainless steel exterior/interior. It does have one neat feature, especially for those with small hands or who lack the strength to break a vacuum seal. If you only partially fill the jar with very hot food, the air inside the container will contract as it cools, thus creating a vacuum that is hard to overcome. With this model, the lid has an additional twist-off top lid that reveals a tiny vacuum release button. This means you have another lid to track/remove when you wash it, but might be useful for some.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy another thermos/food jar?
customer_reviews.text: This has kept my lunch hot, through long days studying and working. If you want to avoid gross microwaves that have been so inconsistently cleaned that an entire ecosystem has since established its own government and is well on the way to an age of countertop conquest, this "food jar" is your new best friend. 5-6hrs later, soup/noodle dishes/various proteins (chicken, beef)/oatmeal were all comfortably hot (thankfully on different days though)!
customer_reviews.author: sjd

customer_reviews.title: Zojirushi never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: Need your oatmeal or soup to stay HOT for 12 hours? Or your ice cream to be cold for the same? Yeah, just do yourself a favor and splurge on the Zojirushi. This one is sizable - holds enough for both my husband and me. And save yourself the sticky hand: Order a GIR extra-long spoon.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: I pack my kids’ hot lunch in these at 7am, and when they eat at school at about 12pm, the food is hot. Not just warm, but still nice and hot. I do prime them with boiling water for 5 minutes before filling them. I wish you could wash them in the dishwasher, but the instructions warn against that. They aren’t hard to hand wash, though. I pack them with half a toothpick so that the children can break the seal with the fat end of the toothpick and unscrew the lids easily. The toothpick fits inside the top lid, so that’s handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Romero

customer_reviews.title: great food thermos
customer_reviews.text: the build quality is fantastic. easy to clean, though you should be aware that the top is several parts, so if you want to do a full cleaning, it's best to disassemble it entirely, but it's not necessary every time you wash them. does a great job keeping foods hot, and this is what we use for our kids lunches. we only hand wash. well designed and exudes quality that you expect from Zojirushi
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Two Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After preheating the flask I find it doesn’t retain heat for as long as some people claim. Used it for coffee & it was not hot only warm after 5 hrs. Reviews stating it keeps hot for 6 hours. This isn’t true. I bought this brand specifically as I thought it would be above average but should’ve just bought a cheap one for the same result
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Park

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!! Keep things very very hot!
customer_reviews.text: After almost 2 years of usage, this thermo is still the best! I usually pre-heat the thermo with some hot/boiling water for a few minutes with millet. Then dump the pre-heat water out, fill it with boiling water all the way up. Then I bring it to work with 1.5 hours commute. By the time I get to the office, the millet congee is thoroughly cooked and steaming hot, the best breakfast in cold mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Y.

customer_reviews.title: Pack lunch all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love this food jar,if design little bigger it was perfect for me, the heat stays warm for a long time,I put the soup at 6 o’clock am to 2pm afternoon, soup still hot. also soup will not pour out, it was much better than the other brand food jar, because I often put it in the bag, if will leak would not too good, so I often use it to pack lunch
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the food hot
customer_reviews.text: I love these thermos!! Easily to clean and food is always hot. The one thing you need to be careful of, is to NOT fill it up completely. Since it’s hot food in there. When opening the lid, it over flows
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not to the Standards of Zojirushi
customer_reviews.text: We have had other Zojirushi thermos products that have been excellent. My coffee in the late afternoon is still almost too hot to drink. With this food jar that has not been the case, after filling with extremely hot food in the morning at lunch it is barely lukewarm. I think it has to do with the lid design - yes it’s easy to open but at the cost of keeping the food hot. This will go on the shelf and not be used, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Challender

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the product. I USED THE PRODUCT TO CONTAIN MY COFFEE, AND IN LESS THAN 2 HOURS MY COFFEE WAS LUKE WARM. MY TRUST IN YOUR COMPANY AND PRODUCT IS AT A ZERO. This is mostly because I paid $26 for the product and another product for $9. 00 gave me a better result. Please make every effort to improve this product .
customer_reviews.author: Denille T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, and it does it well. Food stays hot, absolutely no leaking, and I really appreciate the pressure valve thing they have going on in the lid. Of note- it's a slim little thing, good for about 14-16 oz. max. That's exactly what I need for squeezing a hot lunch into my little mini backpack before I leave for work, but if you're looking to lug around something with more volume than the average can of soup, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: skash

customer_reviews.title: The best food jar
customer_reviews.text: The blue one we returned because it was smaller than I thought. However, we bought the pink bigger one last year (i think). I don't think I wrote the review. Zojirushi is the brand that our family uses a lot because we prepare our tea, lunch, and coffee from home. It keeps everything hot at least for 18-24 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amarsanaa Bat-Ochir

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This theme is awesome! Keep my food hot for at least 4 hours and warm at least 6 hours! During this pandemic it’s a nice product to buy and not need to share the microwave with other people at work!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Keeps soup hot for 6 hours and not leak all over your bag if kept upright (most of the time)
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Kept my soups piping hot for 6 hours. I made sure I followed the instructions and fill it with boiling water, empty, then fill with soup. The one I got (SW-EZE50XA) has 2-cup capacity -- more than enough room for lunch. So far it hasn't leaked -- I put it in a Ziploc bag inside my backpack just in case; mostly I keep it upright, like the instruction says, but once in a while it lays on its side during my commute but it hasn't leaked.
customer_reviews.author: RunSwimEat

customer_reviews.title: Food stays warm till lunch
customer_reviews.text: Daughter says her food is warm at lunch time. She complained her thermos didn't keep the food warm, so I was happy to find that zoji makes thermos and knowing how much we love their bread machine, I was hoping that thermos would be same high quality. It certainly is and I got myself a zoji coffee thermos which also keeps my coffee very hot for a few hours. (Can't comment on how well it keeps the temperature all day, we usually done with drinks and food by lunch)
customer_reviews.author: Solnishko

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We put hot water boiling hot water (160dgrees) into this and placed the closed container into the freezer overnight. NExt morning, checked the temperature of the water--still at 135+degrees. awesome! used during our ski trip and worked beautifully
customer_reviews.author: The Emperor

customer_reviews.title: Stainless not seamless like prior models.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that an excellent brand like Zojirushi is going down the cheap path like so many others. The new food jars now have seams just like the chinese crap food jars you can get anywhere. I highly doubt this will affect the thermal quality of this food jar too much so only deducting one star for visual annoyance. Can’t anyone these days just stick to what got them there? Again I have no doubt this product will function as expected... just trying to make a point that we consumers notice things like this.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thacker

customer_reviews.title: For the soup
customer_reviews.text: Works the best, the only thing on the market that I can actually disassemble completely to clean all parts. Big enough to feed teenagers for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: yk

customer_reviews.title: Your food packing concerns are solved!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing thermos. It keeps hot food hot for hours, and has enabled us to successfully pack our kids' lunches for school this year. It cleans super easy, and is wide enough to easily eat from. It is also plenty big to put as much as you want in, and be satisfied. Good for soup, pasta, you name it. A tip? Fill it with hot water for a few minutes prior to putting the food in; that will warm up the insides, and keep stuff even hotter for longer. We highly recommend this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: 💕 it’s a bit difficult for a PreK4 to open and close, more for an older elementary child and jhs child. Just tossing that out there. It definitely keeps hot food warm 6 hours of you heat it up properly. I leave for duty at 6:30 and eat lunch at 11:30-11:45 most days and my lunch when I used it to see if it kept it warm, was still very nice and hot. Very recommend.
customer_reviews.author: angscriber

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Zojirushi
customer_reviews.text: I used this camping, you can cook your oatmeal in the morning by just adding boiling water to dry oats and sealing the container and waiting. Kept other foods hot and was easy to clear. I like that it isn't as bulky as other hot food storage containers I've looked at. Could have probably done just fine with the 12oz, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Mistercarbohydrate

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it two months ago but just started to use it. The temperature couldn’t hold for even just 5 hours. Totally waste of money. I have another one from “Thermos” works great, my food was still “hot” after 8 hours. I have no idea why I would try this brand, I can’t even return since I have waited too long to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JANDS

customer_reviews.title: Keep things warm for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take oatmeal with me to work in the morning. By the time I get in the office, my oatmeal is still pretty steamy hot. The size of this jar is also not too big, so perfect for my use. If you're looking to pack food for multiple people, though, I'd recommend getting a bigger sized one.
customer_reviews.author: ashanh

customer_reviews.title: Easy make all the fast food
customer_reviews.text: I learn some from YouTube . I make that rice soup with beef and green . Is work ! Easy make all the fast food!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: only keepped food warm for couple hours
customer_reviews.text: it only keep my soup hot for couple hours, so it works just like most of other brands except it charged more compared to other brands, not worth the money even with discount price.
customer_reviews.author: OCC

customer_reviews.title: Keep hot / cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: Zojirushi is the best! The container keeps hot hot for a day easily. I use this for porridge and soup when out, it doesn’t leak or lose the warmth at all. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking lunch to school.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my son to use to take his lunch to school. It does not leak, it keeps the food hot for hours, it is a good size, and he has not managed to damage it (yet). It can be a bit of a nuisance to clean, because it does not go in the dishwasher and you have to take the lid apart to wash it. Also, he reports that sometimes his PE teacher has to help him get it open.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an insulated container to keep my food truly hot for lunch, and it actually works really well. I couldn't believe how hot the food was after about 5 hours when I first used it, and I used it in an area with freezing weather and heavy snowfall. The container works best with hot liquidy foods, such as soups, stews, and porridge. The 3rd party vendor who processed the order was quick and easy to work with. I'm happy with my purchase and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Park

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Must have
customer_reviews.text: I trust this brand for years! They always have great quality and useful products. Some people say that it doesn't keep warm, I assume they didn't tighten the lid top.
customer_reviews.author: ARES

customer_reviews.title: Zojirushi food jar superior to other brands.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mainly for soup at lunch; avoids the wait for your turn at a microwave. Preheating the container with hot water really extends heat factor. The Zojirushi food jar is by far superior to others I have purchased (night and day).
customer_reviews.author: Grape Ape 1041

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wide mouth insulated food jar. Keeps food (soup) hot for 4 hours & warm for at least 6 hours. Pre warm the jar with hot water for 5 min. before you put food in the jar. Glad I bought this.😀
customer_reviews.author: C Kim

customer_reviews.title: Came in a timely manner I love the products I would order all of the products ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner I love the products I would order all of the products they are very good they stay cold all day long with ice in them and they stay hot also I would order or more of them
customer_reviews.author: Janice Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Better food Jar
customer_reviews.text: I pretty love this food jar because I will pack some hot food for my daughter when we go out. And this food jar usually can keep hot around half day. I love it and more useful!!!
customer_reviews.author: freyawu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm. Great stainless steel interior
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item. I thought the bento boxes were my only option, but those had so much plastic I was worried about how long they would last. These are stainless steel inside, even better than the mugs by Zojirushi, and they keep my food warm for hours. I place chunks of warm sweet potatoes in here and just reach in to grab one to snack on.
customer_reviews.author: vanimea

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic but since it is made to last it is an oversite not to make the seals readily available on Amazon or include an extra pair of seals with the unit. 1 because soups soak up the smell 2 because the seals wear out 3 the little seal is easily wash down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smith

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It keeps my daughter's lunch warm. Now she can finally enjoy warm lunch! The quality is great, and the color is very cute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Better food jar
customer_reviews.text: Zojirushi's products have never let us down. The food jar works extremely well with keeping the food temperature. It is a longer cyclone design which may be difference to keep large pieces but perfect to bring soup and each
customer_reviews.author: Kwan F Ng

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Lunches Warm!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because my new position requires me to be on the road sometimes. It keeps my food warm from morning to lunch which is exactly what I need when there's no microwave. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: great product, can keep hot water hot for 24 hours!
customer_reviews.text: great product, can keep hot water hot for 24 hours! I love it when I need to prepare food for little one during travel. You just need boiling water and rice to prepare a bowl of congee for the little one!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my food nice and hot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, I’ve purchased a few of their thermoses and they always keep everything cold or hot.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Best thermos ever
customer_reviews.text: I pack a hot lunch every day for my husband. He says this keeps his food much hotter than any of the other ones we have owned (by Kuuk, Stanley, and Thermos). I was skeptical because I had never heard of the brand but the excellent reviews convinced me to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor M.

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but highest quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making oatmeal by just adding hot water to oatmeal out of can, even for steel cut type.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good Food Jar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this food jar for my daughter for school and she loves it (the colour). I haven't actually put any food in yet so I cannot tell how long it stays hot etc, but will update when product is actually used.
customer_reviews.author: Lucianlady

customer_reviews.title: Love this food container!!!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and beautifully designed container. I use it to carry soup to work, and the soup is still Hot after 6 hours, even though the site says it only holds up to 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size for a first-grade lunch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for a first-grade lunch and can stay warm all day. A lunchbox like this is needed in desperate times
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Hot water
customer_reviews.text: the Top cap wil leak. Keep hot for 12hours. If can fix the leak I will make 5 stars. But for now only3 stars. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: qidengchen

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Holds temperature very well, easy to clean. Can eat directly from it, the opening is wide enough. Its is a little big for me but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! My main purpose for getting this food jar is to bring soup to work, and this item exceeds my expectations! I usually pack my soup at 8pm, eat lunch at noon and the soup is still so steaming hot that I burnt my tongue. One day, work was so busy I didn't get to eat my soup until 5pm and it was still scorching hot! I haven't used this product on cold foods or drinks yet, but I could only imagine that it will have the same results. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.text: I like it. The function is quite good. It really can keep warm or cold as the instruction said.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps soup hot!
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my soup hot for at least 5 hours! I first warm jar with hot water and then add hot soup. Keeps hotter for longer than any other carafe I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: mamajojo

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It has a very nice and compact form factor, which I appreciate. However, it did not seem to keep my food hot for very long. I put hot microwaved food in it around 6:30am and by 11am-12pm, the food has become just warm. This is with pre-heating the thermos with hot water beforehand too. Otherwise, solid product; seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... well for my 6 year old and kept food nice and warm for lunch at 12
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 6 year old and kept food nice and warm for lunch at 12.30 PM. Sometimes she has said that it was hot, which is great because I know the lunch box works. I would just heat up the food in the microwave for lesser time or wont close the lid super tight. Works good for rice, pasta, steamed veggies. Got my second one today for another kid.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best food container yet
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've purchased several through the years that either don't keep warm or pressure seal is so tight that you can't get the darn lid off, especially if its for a kids lunch!! This keeps food warm and able to get lid off no problem plus it has depressurize lid in case it does get too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bikeman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Food Warm
customer_reviews.text: We have a Zojirushi rice cooker for a very long time and is still going strong. When I saw this, I gave it a go, because just like their water bottles, it's good quality. We have another brand of thermos that I pack my daughter's lunch in, but by lunch time, she says her lunch isn't warm. We solved the issue with this thermos. And it's pink with sparkles!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: New fan
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st zojirushi and it’s not my last! Keeps what I need hot for hrs and cold for even longer. As much as I wash it and toss it in the cupboard, still maintains it’s color
customer_reviews.author: 3A22

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable! 8 hours and still hot with steam!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He leaves the house at 4:30 am with piping hot soup or stew. By the time he takes his lunch 11-12:00 pm it’s still hot with steam! Like burn your finger hot! He loves it. He ranges 7-8 hours before opening the lid and still hot. If you’re on the fence just get it.
customer_reviews.author: amay

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make gruel, soups and rice. It is convient to carry for my weekday lunch and long travel. It is easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: WU

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few months now and it sure is nice having hot food for lunch when you're working outside in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Pajamacat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. It can keep my soup very warm after 10 hours. Nothing to complain about from me.
customer_reviews.author: cokestorm

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food hot. We were surprised by how hot it keeps his soup..love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jackson

customer_reviews.title: not as good as other pink and blue one.
customer_reviews.text: zojirushi always hold their quality well. but not this one. I ordered 3 jars with different finish. The blue and pink one held the temperature way better than this stainless steel one. I am returning this one, and order another pink one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jones

customer_reviews.title: worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: so far not bad. I would give it a 5 star if the caps were in one piece. it's a hassle to wash separate pieces, but the quality of the insulated jar is excellent. bought two of these in different colors and very happy. size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This brand has always been very good, and this vacuum flask is also very good
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: the BEST thermomug for kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: you can clean it thoroughly, which is very important for preventing molding!!!
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this food jar. I used it for quick meals while in training to save money. The jar hold heat well, and kept warm for 4 hours or more with boiling hot water. The only thing I don't like about this jar is the lid. I wish there is an easier access to clean the lid once the food over flows (though it is my mistake).
customer_reviews.author: Tibby

customer_reviews.title: is really very good. After 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: Its heat preservation function, as described by the store owner, is really very good. After 12 hours, it is still warm and small, and it is kept in a bag without any contact with it.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was surprising when I receive this item, is really good, no matter keeping warm or cold. The only thing is this jar is pretty deep, need a longer fork or spoon; and also this size is totally fit for boy's.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Made steel cut oatmeal easy..
customer_reviews.text: Made steel cut oatmeal easy...put in steel cut oatmeal and boiled water before I go to bed at night, enjoy the perfectly cooked oatmeal in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Simgredeal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The thermos itself works great and keeps your food warm. I ordered this in January, used two to three times, and by February, the rubber stopper on the inside of the lid broke. I asked for a replacement part given minimal use in less than a month, and was told I had to purchase it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fong

customer_reviews.title: Bad product of high maintenance
customer_reviews.text: The water somehow got inside the walls though I only cleaned it with running water, never soaked never put into the dishwasher. So disappointed with it! We got another one from pottery barn for our toddler to take lunch to daycare. Same money, easier to eat from, dishwasher safe, fun personalized design. And we are so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mahesh sahu

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions by manufacturer and tip by other reviewers to fill with boiling water prior to heat up the container first. Child is happy with yummy pasta from home on those days when the school lunch option a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: dealdiva

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite thermo food jar
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my food hot for hours, so far up to 10 hours and still steaming hot. This is by far my favorite thermo food jar. Can never go wrong with Zojirushi.
customer_reviews.author: Manentej

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly - found it easy to take apart and clean
customer_reviews.text: Product works - and unlike negative reviews, have had no problems taking it apart and cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: syntax

customer_reviews.title: Water went into rubber bottom.
customer_reviews.text: This food warmer container is able to hold the heat great, up to 8 hours long. Not even putting in the dishwasher, just hand wash daily... the water went into the rubber bottom of the container, and no way I can get it out.
customer_reviews.author: c_ngu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food cold or hot. Like the big mouth which makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: valeria

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended but I am pretty disappointed. I was told it would keep food warm but my kids say it is only slightly warm after 4 hours at lunch time. It also extremely difficult to reassemble. My other ones kept the food just as warm, were easy to clean and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a good deal... it is nice brand just wondering if they can have the cap comes with a dropped proof material.....
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and keeps the temperature inside for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: The best jar ever!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food warm for a long time! I use it for my daughter lunches as she loves warm food, so this jar works perfectly! I fill it boiling water for a couple of minutes, then I pour water out and quickly dry the jar with a paper towel. Then I put hot food in it. I tried not to use hot water and jar also worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Fedir Kyslov

customer_reviews.title: I find this container useful and adequate
customer_reviews.text: I find this container useful and adequate. Easy the clean and carry. I don’t like the fact I paid extra for next day delivery, was led to believe it was going to be next day, and it actually took two days. I was charged a premium for next day and didn’t receive what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school lunches -fits nicely in neoprene lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: My kids are in middle and high school. This is the perfect size for their lunches; not too small and not too large. The quality is very good and the thermos seems to hold the heat - my kids have not once complained about a cold lunch. Preheating the thermos with hot water helps. This review is for the 11oz size.
customer_reviews.author: AC Feng

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My soup was leaking from the top of the steam cap.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Fu Liu

customer_reviews.title: Best thermos ever
customer_reviews.text: All together my family have 5 of these.they keep food hot and cold drinks cold.well worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several other brands for keeping soup hot, and this one is the best. It is very easy to clean, very good looking, and keeps the soup hot for hours. I would definitely buy it again. Some of the others were very difficult to clean, especially the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Willard J. Gentile

product_meta.title: Zojirushi Stainless Steel Food Jar
product_meta.description: Size:16.9-Ounce| Color:Black/StainlessZojirushi began in Japan in 1918 as a manufacturer of hand-blown vacuum bottles. They are still known today for their high quality vacuum insulated products. This stainless steel food jar is vacuum insulated so it keeps foods (or beverages) hot or cold for hours. Durable and sanitary 18/8 stainless steel construction will not rust, tarnish or stain, and will not leak harmful chemicals. The interior is polished stainless steel with a nonstick coating and is neutral to taste and smell. Tight -fitted lid has a gasket that seals lid to minimize leaks and maximize heat retention. It has a unique lid designed with a vent that allows users to release the pressure inside to make the lid easier to open when the food jar contains hot foods or beverages. A wide opening of 2 and one half inches makes it easy to fill and clean and allows user to eat directly out of the jar. Compact design takes minimal space while maximizing capacity.
feature_bullets: Eliminates the use of wasteful disposable containers, or the use of a microwave or refrigerator
Dimples on the lid m make it easier to grab and open
Clear-coated finish reduces fingerprints and makes cleanup easy
Good for hot meals, soups, oatmeal, cold desserts and beverages and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,636 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
